attributes.action: Provide Dental treatment to people who have paid into the NI contributions
attributes.additional_details:
I cant get the treatment Ive paid for all my working life while hotels full of illegal mi
grants get first class treatment
attributes.background: Reinstate dental treatment to everyone on the nhs except illegal migrants

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Non-UK nationals can already access NHS dental services. If you're concerned about access to NHS dental services we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to ensure all adults and children have access to a dentist: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625518
